scripts.deploy:gh-pages: npm run build:gh-pages && touch dist/eliza_fruit_website/.nojekyll && git subtree push --prefix dist/eliza_fruit_website origin gh-pages
scripts.deploy:webiste: npm run build -- --base-href='/' && touch dist/eliza_fruit_website/.nojekyll && cd dist/eliza_fruit_website && mv browser/* . && rmdir browser && cp ../../webiste-dockerfile ./Dockerfile && cp ../../webiste-nginx.conf ./nginx.conf && git init && git remote add origin https://github.com/mateuszczerniakowski/webiste.git && git add . && git commit -m 'Deploy optimized Angular build with Docker support' && git branch -M main && git push -f origin main
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push origin day1 --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push origin day1 --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push origin day1 --tags
scripts.lint: ng lint || echo 'Linting not configured - install @angular-eslint/schematics'
scripts.bundle:analyze: npm run build:analyze && echo 'Open http://127.0.0.1:8888 to view bundle analysis'
